description:
Learn how to master IP subnetting for the CCNA exam.

You will learn about:

  • Binary Math
  • IP Addresses
  • Subnet Masks
  • Network Classes
  • Subnetting
  • Magic Number Method
  • VLSM

Key to Success

One of the most difficult stages of the CCNA journey is IP addressing and subnetting. This courses main goal is to focus on IP subnetting topics and help you feel confident to take the CCNA exam.

Content and Overview

Suitable for beginners, through this course, you'll learn all of the CCNA IP addressing fundamentals. Each section includes easy to understand slides and examples.

Starting with the Binary Math, this course will take you through each component of subnetting.

You will have instant access to the course material. All of the course videos can be streamed or downloaded at any time.
title: Master IP Subnetting for the CCNA Exam
